changeSet.author: joemat
changeSet.id: Add a view for getting the latest movements for all assets in micro format
changeSet.createView: SELECT b.move_id, b.move_heading, b.move_location, b.move_moveconn_id, b.move_timestamp, b.move_speed, mc.moveconn_flagstate, mc.moveconn_name FROM movement.movement b INNER JOIN (SELECT move_moveconn_id, MAX(move_timestamp) as MaxValue FROM movement.movement WHERE movement.move_timestamp > (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - INTERVAL '1 DAY') GROUP BY move_moveconn_id) a ON a.move_moveconn_id = b.move_moveconn_id AND a.MaxValue = b.move_timestamp INNER JOIN movement.movementconnect mc ON b.move_moveconn_id = mc.moveconn_asset_id WHERE b.move_timestamp > (CURRENT_TIMESTAMP - INTERVAL '1 DAY')
